- Outdoor air conditioning condenser (Ruud), metal cabinet with front louvers; located on a concrete pad against exterior wall.
- Vegetation/clippings touching the unit at the base; trim back to improve airflow and reduce debris ingress.
- Wall behind unit shows minor cracks in stucco/paint; monitor for moisture intrusion and seal if needed.
- Electrical disconnect box and conduit mounted on wall above unit; verify proper clearance and weatherproofing.
- No visible damage or leaks on the unit; fins appear intact; routine maintenance recommended.
